snippet.title: Synth Riders - Spin Mode [Release Trailer] - July 16, 2020
snippet.description:
Spin to every song in "Spin Mode" - a huge free update now available for everyone in Synth Riders! Enjoy 90, 180, 360, and 360+ spins in the entire OST and custom songs.

Trailer Song: "From Hell" by Dance With The Dead (Synthwave Vol 1)
Stage: Spin City
Player: Kuritsa
--------------------------------------
Synth Riders is available for Quest/Oculus, Steam & PSVR: http://bit.ly/playsr
Join the Synth Riders Discord Community: http://discord.synthridersvr.com/
Official website: https://synthridersvr.com/

Follow Synth Riders:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/synthridersvr
Facebook: http://fb.me/synthridersvr
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/synthridersvr/
